io.sphere.sdk.client

Class TimeoutSphereClientDecorator

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.sphere.sdk.models.Base
      • io.sphere.sdk.client.SphereClientDecorator
        • io.sphere.sdk.client.TimeoutSphereClientDecorator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SphereClient, AutoCloseable

    public final class TimeoutSphereClientDecorator
extends SphereClientDecorator
implements SphereClient
    Wraps a SphereClient to add timeouts. There are no guarantees that the timeout will be after the exact duration. The underlying HTTP client most likely will have a timeout and you may consider to implement it there. If the timeout occurs a SphereTimeoutException will be thrown.
